Baseline with AN/APG-68(V)5 (100 km) upgrading to Özgür-II (AESA, 140 km equiv.); 4-6 AIM-120C-5 loads; No. 132 Sqn at Balikesir; cost-effective filler for forward basing, extending to 100 km via ground radars.

MESA AESA radar (400 km horizon) for off-board targeting and AIM-120 updates; ARES-2A ESM upgrades (2025 IOC) enhance ECCM; 501st Squadron at Konya, critical kill-chain enabler for F-16 salvos to 110 km.
Block 45.1 upgraded with boom refueling for 2+ hour BVR extensions on F-16/F-4; 101st Squadron at Incirlik; enables sustained patrols in Black Sea/Med ops via NATO integration.
Multirole with underwing pods for probe refueling, supporting fighter surge deployments; TAI components; 11th Air Transport Squadron at Kayseri, bolsters forward basing for BVR networks.
Dual-role with ELINT suite (200 km sensors) for enemy radar cueing/jamming; TAI-built; 41st Squadron at Merzifon, enhances BVR by degrading IADS, with avionics mods (TCAS/IFF) complete 2025.
